i think i can settle this little disagreement. the thing about ms, they only write a few os's at any one time, ms-dos was concurrently one after the other mods and updates, so is with the windows desktop, server and workstation os's, which if you look under the hood a little, is dos with a GUI - Graphical User Interface, the windows series is just mods and upgrades.
However, with windows BlackComb (afore mentioned) the system was completely rebuilt from the ground up, using modern forms of all previous incarnations of windows plus a few new tricks. as me was to 98se, 8 is to 7 and vista, when ms beta they stage it like anyother software company or us home enthusiasts, alpha - beta - rc - rtm, but to begin they use whats already working like 7's boot screen, layout, icons, even the little annoying baloons, but relink the kernel to have new things hidden within it. i have tried many since i found files saying win8, and very few are real betas of 8. to all you slating off the upper, have you tried them side by side to 7? each and every function and setting? ofcourse not! so try showing real balls and see for yourself if its real or not, the team behind this up have worked very hard to bring us something they have worked on, show some respect and dont get if you just want to complain, or better still, take their lead and make your own version for us to rubbish off!!! thank you for the up, shad0wd0wn and team ignor the retarded sensationalist twats and show the gatester how things are done on real street!
